Title: Year 501: The Conquest Continues (1993)
Notes: Banned for distribution in South Korean military as one of 23 books banned on August 1, 2008.

Title: Bad Samaritans: The Myth of Free Trade and the Secret History of Capitalism
Notes: One of 23 books which from August 1, 2008, onward is banned for distribution within the South Korean military.

Title: One Spoon on This Earth
Notes: Banned for distribution within the South Korean military for being "pro-North Korea". It was one of 23 books banned there beginning in August 2008.
